message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. I would like to counteroffer at $120.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $135.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering your last offer, I would like to counteroffer at $125.
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $130.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. I would like to counteroffer at $127.
I'm getting close to your price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $129. It's the best I can do.
Considering your latest offer, I would like to counteroffer at $128.
I'm getting close to the end of my negotiation range, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $129.50. It's my final offer.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiation, Alice. Considering your final offer, I would like to counteroffer at $129.
